name: 2048 Blitz
description:
2048 Blitz is a clone of "2048" written using Godot with the twist that it has a 60 second time limit.

While this may look like a mobile game you will need to use either your arrow keys or use a D-Pad on a controller to play this game, didn't get round to doing touch controls for it in the end (or a leaderboard).

This Game was made in a weekend for the mini jam #85 - gold Jam. Admittedly the only use of Gold is the probably impossible task of getting to "2048" within the timelimit.

Submitted early as I could feel my motivation dropping.

Can you beat my high score of 2332? comment below.
